column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Run a Sweepstakes
#Text=A sweepstakes can really help your ' bottom line ' , by adding to your mailing list and your contacts .
#Text=Read this article to learn how to do one properly .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Have the infrastructure to support it .
#Text=You will need to have a server that can handle the load .
#Text=The world is full of people who want something for nothing and a lot of those people invest a lot of time in it !
#Text=Infrastructure would be :
#Text=Server
#Text=Mail list support
#Text=Database support ( for the information received when they fill out entries )
#Text=Do some research into various organizations that do data collection .
#Text=Learning , and utilizing , the demographics is one of the many uses of data received in a sweepstakes .
#Text=Be sure the one you get will work for you .
#Text=Understand that when you offer prizes , ( usually offered by a third party ) , that you may be limited as to who can enter .
#Text=Be prepared for the fallout from the rest of the world !
#Text=Understand , and accept , that it will never be easy enough .
#Text=Some people just wo n't get it .
#Text=Be prepared to either have a bunch of FAQs for every problem they have , or ready to answer all of their emails .
#Text=Do n't have there be just one method of entering it .
#Text=Some methods that you can use are :
#Text=Form entry
#Text=A hard-coded link to the form
#Text=Have a way for them to enter manually , as in the terms and conditions
#Text=Understand what compliance is and how it varies from state to state .
#Text=And then Be Compliant .
#Text=One things you can do is ' borrow ' the terms and conditions from a similar contest and adopt it to your purposes .
#Text=Know that your email list will not be exactly the goldmine you are expecting .
#Text=When you start sending out emails , you will get many unsubscribe requests .
#Text=Especially , if it gets picked up by a sweepstake offering site .
#Text=You will come out ahead , but be prepared to be narrowing it down for a while .
#Text=Make sure your selection will be random .
#Text=There are sites online that will generate a random number for you .
#Text=Each entry will have a number , so choose a random number from there .
#Text=Be able to manage the costs .
#Text=The costs will come from the infrastructure mentioned before as well as other costs you might incur .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Most companies pass off the tax liability to the winners .
#Text=Be sure they understand , or the opportunity is there for them , that when entering your contest .
#Text=If you are not incorporated , it is not a good idea to hold a sweepstakes .
#Text=You will be opening yourself to lawsuits .
#Text=Contact your local tax authority so that they can tell you how to deal with the value of the prize being offered .
